snippet.title: Ayakashi: Romance Reborn Dawn Chapter & Twilight Chapter  for Nintendo Switch™ - Promotional Reel
snippet.description:
The opening movie for the Nintendo Switch™ download-only games
"Ayakashi: Romance Reborn Dawn Chapter & Twilight Chapter"

◆Official Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/switch/english/

◆Story◆
After finding an ancient bell wand one day, the heroine of this tale discovers she possesses magical Onmyoji powers. Soon after, a series of Ayakashi spirits straight out of legends appear, telling her of their bonds in a past life. A tragic tale 1,000 years in the making comes to life.
